Description: This registry defines the update messages for Nvidia.

ComponentUpdateSkipped.Description: Indicates that update of component has been skipped
ComponentUpdateSkipped.Message: The update operation for the component %1 is skipped because %2.

DebugTokenAlreadyInstalled.Description: Indicates that the device has a token already installed and cannot finish current request.
DebugTokenAlreadyInstalled.Message: Debug token for device '%1' has already been installed.

DebugTokenInstallationSuccess.Description: Signifies the successful completion of debug token installation.
DebugTokenInstallationSuccess.Message: The operation to install a debug token for device '%1' has been successfully completed.

DebugTokenRequestSuccess.Description: Signifies the successful completion of the debug token request.
DebugTokenRequestSuccess.Message: The operation to request a debug token for device '%1' has been successfully completed.

DebugTokenStatusSuccess.Description: Signifies the successful completion of the debug token status request.
DebugTokenStatusSuccess.Message: The operation to obtain a token status for device '%1' has been successfully completed.

DebugTokenUnsupported.Description: Indicates that the device does not support debug token functionality.
DebugTokenUnsupported.Message: Device '%1' does not support debug token functionality.

DebugTokenEraseFailed.Description: Indicates that debug token erase operation has failed for the device.
DebugTokenEraseFailed.Message: The operation to erase a debug token for device '%1' has failed with error '%2'

RecoveryStarted.Description: Indicates that recovery has started on a component

RecoverySuccessful.Description: Indicates that recovery has successfully completed on a component

FirmwareNotInRecovery.Description: Indicates that a firmware is not in Recovery Mode

StageSuccessful.Description: Indicates that image is successfully staged on the device

Name: Nvidia Update Message Registry
